Conditionally formats a worksheet based on data within the dataframe as a side effect.

fmt_luminex_results.Rd

Conditionally formats a worksheet based on data within the dataframe as a side effect.

fmt_luminex_results(
  excel_file,
  dFrame,
  sheet_name = "final_result",
  low_positive_controls_df
)

Arguments

excel_file

character vector with the name of the Excel file
dFrame

dataframe being used to guide highlighting. It is the same one as was used to make the worksheet.
sheet_name

name of the worksheet to highlight.
low_positive_controls_df

dataframe with the low positive controls

Value

Excel file name of file that has been formatted to highlight non-negative results in the sheet indicated. This highlights "I" and "P" results

Contents

Developed by R. Mark Sharp.

Site built with pkgdown 1.5.0.
